txt.en: Wynmar appears to be rather smitten with Noriel
Noriel has asked Wynmar to lead his people from Thinglad, and he has given his word
The Elves of Thinglad are unveiled to their Stangard neighbours at last.

'I greet you, [placeholder]. I apologize for following you, but we did...and it is a good thing, too. It looks like we were just in time to save you and your fair friend.\n\n'Pray...introduce me to this brave lady. I rarely see a warrior fight so well, man or woman.'
You should speak with Noriel at once.
'Those who did this are surely still nearby. I can smell their foul breath upon the air. Be alert, [placeholder]!'
Orcs are attacking Thinglad!\n\nYou should defeat many Orcs.
'[placeholder], I look to you to ensure that Wynmar keeps his word. Please help the Rohirrim with anything they need before they depart these woods.\n\n'Will you see our friends back to their camp?'
Observe the dialogue between Noriel and Wynmar.
'Are you ready to bring Wynmar back to his camp?'
